metadata.inclusion:
1. Insert the AAA battery
2. Triple or single short press the Z-button
3. The LED will blink less than 5 seconds and then keep on for 3 seconds if successful
metadata.exclusion:
1. Insert the AAA battery
2. Triple click the Z-button
3. The LED will turn off within 1 second if successful
metadata.reset:
1. Insert the AAA battery
2. Press and hold the Z button for more than 20 seconds
3. The LED will keep on until the Z-button is released
